display_long_description:
Welcome to Nurba! — the Ultimate VR Playground.

Dive into a chaotic, fast-paced, and ever-expanding VR universe where anything can happen. Built from the ground up for virtual reality, Nurba! delivers a wild mix of action-packed game modes, social chaos, and unpredictable fun — all in one place.

From intense battles in Nurba Battlegrounds to spine-chilling experiences in The Beneath, from frantic parkour in Nurba Course to mind-bending encounters in The Liminal District, there's always something new to discover. Want to show off your creativity? Head to Creator Studio. Want to test your luck? Try RNG. Want to fight for survival? Enter Zurba Survival, The Meat Grinder, or our ever-expanding rogue-like arenas. With over 30+ unique game modes (and more constantly being added), no two sessions of Nurba! are ever the same.

You’re not just a player — you're part of the Nurba! story. Earn ranks from F5 to GODSPAWN, uncover lore surrounding the powerful Luminaries and yokai, and build your legacy in a world on the edge of chaos. Challenge friends, form factions, attend live events, or just goof off with strangers in the sandbox.

With a vibrant community, constant content updates, and a world that rewards curiosity, Nurba! is more than a game — it’s a VR lifestyle.

This isn’t just your next VR game. This is Nurba!
Ready to jump in?
